00020 namespace votca { namespace moo {
00021 
00022 CrgUnit::~CrgUnit()
00023 {
00024     _planes.clear();
00025     _positions.clear();
00026     _norms.clear();
00027 }
00028 
00029 CrgUnit::CrgUnit(vector <vec> positions,
00030                  vector <vec> norms,
00031                  vector <vec> planes,
00032                  const unsigned int & id,
00033                  CrgUnitType * type,
00034                  const unsigned int & molId) {
00035 
00036     vector <vec>::iterator it_pos;
00037     vector <vec>::iterator it_norm;
00038     vector <vec>::iterator it_planes;
00039 
00040     double toll = 1E-6;
00041     vec xvec(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00042     vec yvec(0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00043 
00044     for (it_pos = positions.begin(),
00045          it_norm = norms.begin(),
00046          it_planes = planes.begin() ;
00047          it_pos != positions.end();
00048          ++it_pos, ++it_norm, ++it_planes) {
00049 
00050          _positions.push_back(*it_pos);
00051          if (abs(*it_norm) > toll && abs(*it_planes) > toll) {
00052              _norms.push_back(*it_norm);
00053              _planes.push_back(*it_planes);
00054          }
00055          else {
00056              _norms.push_back(xvec);
00057              _planes.push_back(yvec);
00058          }
00059     }
00060 
00061     _molid = molId;
00062     _id    = id;
00063     _type  = type;
00064 
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CrgUnit::copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg)
00068 {
00069     vector <vec>::iterator it_pos;
00070     vector <vec>::iterator it_norm;
00071     vector <vec>::iterator it_planes;
00072 
00073     _positions.clear();
00074     _norms.clear();
00075     _planes.clear();
00076 
00077     for (it_pos = (acrg._positions).begin(),
00078          it_norm = (acrg._norms).begin(),
00079          it_planes = (acrg._planes).begin();
00080          it_pos != (acrg._positions).end();
00081          ++it_pos, ++it_norm, ++it_planes) {
00082 
00083          _positions.push_back(*it_pos);
00084          _norms.push_back(*it_norm);
00085          _planes.push_back(*it_planes);
00086     }
00087 
00088     _molid = acrg._molid;
00089     _id    = acrg._id;
00090     _type  = acrg._type;
00091 
00092     // initialise variables derived from CrgUnitType
00093     _name = acrg._name;
00094 }
00095 
00096 mol_and_orb * CrgUnit::rotate_translate_beads()
00097 {
00098     mol_and_orb *a = new mol_and_orb;
00099     orb * _orb     = new orb;
00100 
00101     a->define_bs(_type->GetBS());
00102     a->cp_atompos(_type->GetCrgUnit());
00103     a->cp_atoms(_type->GetCrgUnit());
00104 
00105     _orb->init_orbitals_stripped(_type->GetOrb(),
00106                                  _type->GetTransOrbs().size());
00107     a->assign_orb(_orb);
00108 
00109     _type->rotate_each_bead(_positions.begin(),
00110                             _norms.begin(),
00111                             _planes.begin(), a);
00112     return a;
00113 }

00118 void CrgUnit::rot_two_mol(CrgUnit & two,

00127     vector <vec>::iterator bestpos1;
00128     vector <vec>::iterator bestpos2;
00129 
00130     bestpos1 = _positions.begin();
00131     bestpos2 = two._positions.begin();
00132 
00133     /*double d = abs( two._com - _com );
00134         
00135     for ( com2 = (two._altcom).begin(), pos2 = (two._altpos).begin() ;
00136     com2 != (two._altcom).end() ; ++com2, ++pos2 ){

00151             bestpos1 = pos1 -> begin();
00152             bestpos2 = two._positions.begin();
00153             d=d_t;
00154         }
00155     }
00156

00166                 d=d_t;
00167             }
00168         }
00169     }*/

00172                             _planes.begin(), &mol1);

00174     (two._type)->rotate_each_bead(bestpos2, two._norms.begin(),
00175                                   two._planes.begin(), &mol2);

00178 void CrgUnit::rotate(matrix mat)
00179 {
00180     vector <vec> ::iterator it_norm = _norms.begin();
00181     vector <vec> ::iterator it_plane = _planes.begin();
00182     for (  ;
00183           it_norm != _norms.end();
00184           ++it_norm, ++it_plane) {
00185           vec a = *it_norm;
00186           vec b = *it_plane;
00187           *it_norm = mat * a;
00188           *it_plane = mat * b;
00189     }
00190 
00191     vec a;
00192     //    vec a = mat * _com;
00193     //    _com = a;
00194     vector < vec> ::iterator it_vec;
00195     /*for (it_vec = _altcom.begin() ; it_vec != _altcom.end(); ++it_vec) {
00196         a = *it_vec;
00197      *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00198     }*/
00199     for (it_vec = _positions.begin(); it_vec != _positions.end(); ++it_vec) {
00200         a = *it_vec;
00201         *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00202     }
00203     /*vector < vector < vec > > :: iterator it_altpos;
00204     for (it_altpos = _altpos.begin() ;
00205          it_altpos != _altpos.end() ; ++it_altpos){
00206         for (it_vec =  it_altpos->begin();
00207              it_vec != it_altpos->end() ; ++it_vec ){
00208              a = *it_vec;
00209      *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00210         }
00211     }*/
00212 }
